root.name: Pajama Sam's SockWorks
root.description: In this game, Pajama Sam controls the Sock-O-Matic, a machine capable of sorting socks into different laundy hampers. Players must place and control levers, swing arms, color changes, chutes, and other mechanical apparatus in order to guide socks to the correct bin. The game comes with over 250 levels, and includes a level builder.
